panels.title: 最近执行情况（次数/分钟）

targets.expr: sum(sum(irate(schedule_total{job=~"${job:pipe}", instance=~"${instance:pipe}", error="", panic=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (job) / sum(irate(schedule_total{job=~"${job:pipe}", instance=~"${instance:pipe}"}[$__rate_interval]))  by (job)) by (job)

sum by (job) (irate(cache_hit_total{job=~"${job:pipe}", instance=~"${instance:pipe}", hit="true"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (job) (irate(cache_hit_total{job=~"${job:pipe}", instance=~"${instance:pipe}"}[$__rate_interval]))
